metadata.feature_description: Main analytics dashboard showing overall community metrics including user engagement, content creation, and activity trends

steps.action: Login as SuperUser and navigate to PersonaBar > Dashboard
steps.actual: Dashboard menu is accessible with Site Analytics and Community Analytics options

steps.action: Hover over Dashboard icon to reveal submenu
steps.expected: Submenu should show Community Analytics option
steps.actual: Submenu shows Site Analytics and Community Analytics options

steps.action: Click on Community Analytics menu item
steps.expected: Community Analytics dashboard should load with metrics and charts
steps.actual: Dashboard panel is completely blank. JavaScript error in console: TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function at dashboardClass.init (social-dashboard-combined-instance.js:1025:39)

issues: CRITICAL: Community Analytics dashboard fails to initialize due to missing utility.serializeCustomDate function
JavaScript error prevents any dashboard content from rendering
Error occurs in social-dashboard-combined-instance.js at line 1025

test_scenarios.scenario_name: View dashboard with different time periods (daily, weekly, monthly, yearly)

steps.action: Attempt to access time period selector on Community Analytics dashboard
steps.expected: Time period selector should be visible with options for Day, Week, Month, Year, Custom
steps.actual: Cannot test - dashboard fails to load due to JavaScript error. Panel is blank.

issues: Test blocked by critical JavaScript error preventing dashboard initialization

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Compare metrics between two time periods

steps.action: Attempt to access comparative term selector on Community Analytics dashboard
steps.expected: Comparative term options should be available (Day-on-Day, Week-on-Week, Month-on-Month, Year-on-Year)
steps.actual: Cannot test - dashboard fails to load due to JavaScript error. Panel is blank.

issues: Test blocked by critical JavaScript error preventing dashboard initialization

steps.action: Attempt to view metrics on Community Analytics dashboard
steps.expected: Dashboard should display metrics for user engagement, content creation, activity trends
steps.actual: Cannot test - dashboard fails to load due to JavaScript error. No metrics are displayed.

issues: Test blocked by critical JavaScript error preventing dashboard initialization

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test dashboard loading with no data

steps.action: Attempt to view dashboard behavior with no analytics data
steps.expected: Dashboard should display 'No data available' message gracefully
steps.actual: Cannot test - dashboard fails to load due to JavaScript error before any data handling occurs.

issues: Test blocked by critical JavaScript error preventing dashboard initialization

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify dashboard refreshes with new data

steps.expected: Dashboard should refresh and display updated metrics
steps.actual: Cannot test - dashboard fails to load due to JavaScript error. No refresh functionality accessible.

issues: Test blocked by critical JavaScript error preventing dashboard initialization

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test responsive layout on different screen sizes

steps.action: Attempt to test responsive layout of Community Analytics dashboard
steps.expected: Dashboard should adapt to different screen sizes maintaining usability
steps.actual: Cannot test - dashboard fails to load due to JavaScript error. No layout to evaluate.

issues: Test blocked by critical JavaScript error preventing dashboard initialization

observations: CRITICAL BUG: The Community Analytics dashboard is completely non-functional due to a JavaScript error
Error details: TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function at dashboardClass.init (social-dashboard-combined-instance.js:1025:39)
The utility.serializeCustomDate function appears to be missing from the PersonaBar utility module
Code review shows the CommunityAnalyticsController.cs expects period, comparativeTerm, startDate, endDate parameters which cannot be sent because the dashboard UI never renders

The resource file (CommunityAnalytics.resx) contains all expected UI labels including time period options (Day, Week, Month, Year), comparative terms, and metric labels, but these never appear in the UI
Site Analytics dashboard (also under Dashboard menu) loads successfully but shows its own warning about Google Analytics Connector not being configured
The Community Analytics module appears to depend on DNN Analytics Warehouse and Social Library which may not be properly initialized
